name: Galaxya
description: Galaxya is my first real game where i past a lot of time, you control a little spaceShip and you have to survive because the pirate are invading the space. Its me who do the programming, some sound and graph and i'm alone so be kind, as i said its my first real game so if you can try it and share me your experience it will be nice and i will be able to progress and make this game better ! thank you
